typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Last Name} as string,
		{First Name} as string,
		{User Name} as string,
		IsExempt as boolean,
		IsActive as boolean,
		{License Type} as string,
		Column1 as string,
		{License Number} as string,
		{License State} as string,
		{License Activation Date} as string,
		{License Expiration Date} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT\nui.ui_last_name as [Last Name]\n,ui.ui_first_name as [First Name]\n,lg.lg_name as [User Name]\n, CONVERT(Bit, 0) as [IsExempt]\n, CONVERT(Bit, 1) as [IsActive]\n, CASE \n	WHEN (ui.ui_loan_originator_id IS NOT NULL AND ui.ui_loan_originator_id !=\'\') THEN \'Origination\'\n	WHEN usl.StateLicenseId IS NOT NULL THEN \'NLMS\'\n	ELSE \'\'\n	END as [License Type]\n,ui.ui_loan_originator_id as [Column1]\n,usl.StateLicenseId as [License Number]\n,usl.StateAbbreviation as [License State]\n,\'\' as [License Activation Date]\n,\'\' as [License Expiration Date]\nfrom user_info ui\nleft join login lg on ui.ui_id = lg.ui_id\nleft join UserStateLicense usl on ui.ui_id = usl.userid\nwhere ui.ui_type != \'Cons\'\nand ui.ui_suspended = \'N\'',
	format: 'query') ~> UserLicense
source(output(
		TypeId as integer,
		Description as string,
		LoanLevelFieldId as integer,
		LoanLevelExemptFieldId as integer,
		ActivationDate as integer,
		ExpirationDate as integer,
		State as integer,
		IsNMLS as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LicenseType
source(output(
		userID as string,
		userLogonName as string,
		userPassword as string,
		userPWexpDt as timestamp,
		userFirstName as string,
		userLastName as string,
		userBRANid as string,
		userAcctExec as boolean,
		userActive as boolean,
		userPhone as string,
		userFax as string,
		userEmail as string,
		userRSTYid as integer,
		userCommissionPerc as decimal(16,6),
		UpdatedByID as string,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		userposID as integer,
		userMI as string,
		userEXT as string,
		userLogonAccountIsLocked as boolean,
		userConsecLogonFailures as integer,
		userForcePWChange as boolean,
		userClientID as integer,
		userType as string,
		userIsPrice as boolean,
		userIsManager as boolean,
		userManager as string,
		userSecretQuestion as string,
		userSecretAnswer as string,
		userAuthToken as string,
		userAuthTokenDate as timestamp,
		userAuthTokenEmail as string,
		userAuthTokenData as string,
		userAuthTokenPhone as string,
		userAuthTokenSmsProviderId as string,
		userLastSuccessfullLogin as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> User
UserLicense, LicenseType join({License Type} == Description,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> SelectValidLicense
SelectValidLicense, User join({User Name} == userLogonName,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> SelectValidUser
SelectValidUser sink(input(
		UserId as string,
		LicenseTypeId as integer,
		LicenseNumber as string,
		IsExempt as boolean,
		IsActive as boolean,
		ActivationDate as timestamp,
		ExpirationDate as timestamp,
		LicenseState as string,
		ID as integer,
		MID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		UserId = userID,
		LicenseTypeId = TypeId,
		LicenseNumber = {License Number},
		IsExempt,
		IsActive,
		LicenseState = {License State},
		ActivationDate = {License Activation Date},
		ExpirationDate = {License Expiration Date}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetUserLicense
